plugin.name: Name
plugin.nameupderr: Error updating servername, server not found

category.title: General
category.item: The ServerSettings plugin allows you to change all server related settings. Mostly all options will need a challenge restart or mapchange to take in effect. Its a good practice to allways restart the current challenge after changing this settings, even if a option don't need that.

category.title: General settings
category.item: Name of the server
Comment info of the server
Shows/hides the server from the serverlist
Shows/hides the buddynotifications on this server
information currently not available
information currently not available
If enabled, the starting position of a players gets randomly changed a little bit at round-start. This is against keymakro usage.
information currently not available
Enables/disables challenge downloads
If enabled, server will automatically save replays of each round
information currently not available

category.title: Password settings
category.item: Password the player will need to play on this server
Password the player will need to play join this server as specator
Password the player will need to play join this server as referee

category.title: P2P settings
category.item: Enables/disables the P2P upload
Enables/disables the P2P download

category.title: Max. Players
category.item: Maximum number of players allowed on this server
Maximum number of specators allowed on this server

category.title: Call Vote
category.item: Time until a vote ends (if not a players voted)
